backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping five application features (upload, transform, filters, adjustments, export) to their implementing source files and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document providing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the photo editor's components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point titled 'Photo Editor' that mounts the React app into a root div via the main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders EditorPage as the sole page of the single-page application.
frontend/src/components/AdjustmentsPanel: Right-panel component rendering four labeled sliders (brightness, contrast, saturation, sharpness) ranging from -100 to +100 with a reset button and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/CropTool.tsx: Interactive crop overlay component with draggable corner, edge, and move handles that converts display-coordinate crop selections to full-resolution image coordinates on apply.
frontend/src/components/ExportButton.tsx: Button component that triggers a PNG export action and displays a loading spinner while the export is in progress.
frontend/src/components/FilterStrip.tsx: Horizontally scrollable strip of filter thumbnail buttons that previews each filter preset on the uploaded image and highlights the active selection.
frontend/src/components/ImageCanvas.tsx: Canvas component that redraws the uploaded image with all transformations and CSS filters applied whenever its props change.
frontend/src/components/TransformToolbar: Renders a vertical toolbar with buttons for rotate, flip, crop toggle, and reset transform operations, using tooltips for each action.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdjustments.ts: Custom hook managing image adjustment state (brightness, contrast, etc.) with setAdjustment and resetAdjustments helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useFilters.ts: Custom hook managing the active filter preset selection, exposing the filter list, active filter, and select/reset functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageExport.ts: Custom hook that exports the edited image as a PNG blob and triggers a browser download, tracking export loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageTransform.ts: Custom hook managing image transform state (rotation, flip, crop) with individual action callbacks and a full reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageUpload.ts: Custom hook handling image file upload via file input or drag-and-drop, loading the image into an HTMLImageElement and exposing state for the loaded image, loading status, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module indicating no backend queries are needed since the photo editor operates entirely client-side.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining a dark photo-editor theme using Tailwind and OKLCH CSS custom properties, plus custom scrollbar and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/EditorPage.tsx: Main editor page component composing image upload, canvas display, transform toolbar, crop tool, filter strip, adjustments panel, and export button into a full photo editor UI.
frontend/src/utils/adjustmentFilters.ts: Defines the Adjustments interface and default values, and provides functions to convert adjustment slider values (-100 to +100) into CSS filter strings and combine them with preset filters.
frontend/src/utils/canvasTransform.ts: Defines TransformState and CropRect interfaces, and provides functions to draw a transformed (rotated, flipped, cropped) image with CSS filters onto a canvas and export the result as a PNG blob.
frontend/src/utils/filterPresets.ts: Defines the FilterPreset interface and exports an array of nine named CSS filter presets (e.g., Vivid, B&W, Sepia, Warm) for one-click photo effects.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with custom dark-editor colors, teal/amber accents, typography, border radius, box shadows, and animation keyframes, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state including version, feature list, architectural notes, and pending feature requests for a dark-themed Android photo editing app with crop, filters, adjustments, and PNG export capabilities.
